name: Granted
tag_list: job-search, granted, jobs, search-engine-for-jobs, job-search-engine, job-listings, search-jobs, career, employment
description: Granted.com is a free job search engine
overview:
Granted.com is a free job search engine that connects jobseekers with real job openings quickly, efficiently, and without any cost. It provides an uncluttered and user-friendly interface designed upon actual needs and preferences of jobseekers.

The “Granted” job search is significantly different from older job search engines. It is built from the ground up on latest search algorithms and provides results of the highest relevance. It’s a super job information aggregator that pulls in job advertisements from all possible sources like internet job boards, blogs, forums and company websites, and then sorts the information with contextual categorization techniques. The Granted.com jobs database is also fed supplemental information from offline job information sources like print media classifieds, thus providing greater depth to its job searches.

Granted.com is powered by the Employment Research Institute which also powers many niche and private job boards. Jobseekers who upload their resumes at Granted.com also have the advantage of reaching multiple niche employer groups through a single interface. Similarly, employers who use the Granted.com services are aided by the advanced functionalities.
